body: Well, art is great and you're an artist who is centric on NTR, so... Do a 13-4 and make it as Issei fucking someone else and leaving Rias, with her knowing of course, something similar to this. I'd also love if you did the same for the Akeno one making a 22-6 as well as all your other works. I'm sure you'll be perceived much better and be more loved and supported😊
Idk why but this is somehow funny af
why tho? would it not have been better to turn isse into a big dragon then fk her if the artist wanted a monster cock story? i dont see the need for NTRing stories to add a really lewd element.
How did I stumbled upon this shit
Lets be honest issei claps thid pork chop

@Shiro Kizu absolutely not, from the beginning Rias a high noble demon, no one will touch her at least he’s not in the same rank as her . Plus Issei have more powers even without his Sacred Gear, read Ln .

With this's types of ntr you really can't get mad cuz the story itself is very unrealistic compare to the actual show or other ntr story and the art isn't the best compare to other ntr artist, now dont get me wrong the art isn't horrible but it's definitely not as good as the others
